snippet: There is so much noise in jobs numbers that the threshold for what counts as an economically and politically significant jobs report ought to be fairly high. Friday's report looks like one of those exceptional cases.
abstract: There is so much noise in jobs numbers that the threshold for what counts as an economically and politically significant jobs report ought to be fairly high. Friday's report looks like one of those exceptional cases.

headline.main: Jobs News Makes Obama's Case Easier
